You should also copy any referenced linux +copy all the needed JDK libraries, and any other user JNI libraries that were used. +You should also copy any referenced linux @@ -83,2 +84,3 @@ - If the windows libraries are not identical, then they may also need to be copied - to the debugger machine and included in PATH. +You can also include user JNI libraries in PATH. +If the windows libraries are not identical, then they may also need to be copied +to the debugger machine and included in PATH.
